404.TITLE: Sorry, we couldn't find this page
404.DESCRIPTION: Please check in the address bar of your browser if you have entered the correct website address.

500.TITLE: Sorry, we are currently experiencing technical problems
500.DESCRIPTION: Please try to access the page again in a few minutes.

ERRORS.SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

OTHERS.META_TITLE: VetTrust: Your veterinarian at over 30 locations in Switzerland
OTHERS.META_DESCRIPTION: Whatever your pet needs, a small animal practice or veterinary clinic from VetTrust is just a stone's throw away. With over 30 locations nationwide and comprehensive veterinary medicine, our veterinary group is the best choice for pet healthy pets. For a lifetime.

SEARCH.TITLE: Find one of our locations near you

COOKIEBOT.TITLE: This website uses cookies
COOKIEBOT.DESCRIPTION: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, provide social media features, and analyze traffic to our website. We also share information about your use of our website with our social media, advertising and analytics partners. Our partners may combine this information with other data you have provided to them or that they have collected as part of your use of the Services.

MENU_LIST.TITLE: Discover Clinica Alpina
MENU_LIST.HOME_DESCRIPTION: Get a general overview of Clinica Alpina here.
MENU_LIST.NEWS_DESCRIPTION: All the latest news and everyday stories from VetTrust.
MENU_LIST.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Find out what Clinica Alpina is all about and what is important to us.
MENU_LIST.ANIMAL_DESCRIPTION: Read useful animal knowledge from our experts here.
MENU_LIST.CAREER_DESCRIPTION: Want to become a part of VetTrust? Learn more here!
MENU_LIST.GLOBAL_PARTNERS_DESCRIPTION: All our partnerships at a glance

SUCCESS_MODAL.TITLE: Thank you very much! We have received your message
SUCCESS_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: We will get back to you as soon as possible

EMERGENCY_MODAL.TITLE: Our toll-free emergency number
EMERGENCY_MODAL.DESCRIPTION_1: Around the clock, seven days a week. In case of urgent emergencies, please make your way to our clinic immediately.
EMERGENCY_MODAL.DESCRIPTION_2: Do you have an acute emergency with your pet? Do you feel unsure whether it is an emergency at all?
EMERGENCY_MODAL.DESCRIPTION_3: Do not hesitate and call us. Using zip code recognition, you will be redirected to the location closest to you on duty.
EMERGENCY_MODAL.PHONE_NUMBER_HEADING: Dial the number in urgent emergencies:
EMERGENCY_MODAL.PHONE_NUMBER_CHARGEABLE_HEADING:
Dial the number in urgent emergencies:
(chargeable FR {{price}}/minute)
